title: 08/04/21 DPS Hour 3 Steve Palazzolo and Joey Votto
itunes:title: 08/04/21 DPS Hour 3 Steve Palazzolo and Joey Votto
description:
Steve Palazzolo talks to Dan about his new list of top NFL receiving corps. Steve defends his top choice of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers as the top receiving corp going into the new season. Joey Votto tells Dan that, as a first baseman, you have to be nice to the other team's players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
